name: Crunchy Chicken Strips Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Crunchy Chicken Strips Recipe: Boneless Chicken Breast (stripes) 300 gms Vinegar 2 tbsp Baking Powder ½ tsp Salt 1 tsp Red Pepper (crushed) ½ tsp Black Pepper (crushed) ½ tsp Red Chili Garlic Sauce 3 tbsp Eggs 2 Self-rising Flour 1 cup Bread Crumbs 1 cup Garlic Powder 1 tsp
instructions: Marinate chicken strips with vinegar baking powder salt, chili garlic sauce and both the peppers for 1 hour coat in self raising flour. then in beaten eggs finally in bread crumbs mixed with garlic powder. deep fry. Serve with fries.
